H0.text: what kind of government is mali. Monarchy

H1.text: what kind of government is mali. Theocracy

H3.text: what kind of government is mali. Republic

A4.text: Mali is a republic, officially known as the Republic of Mali.

A5.text: The system of government in Mali can be described as 'semi-presidential'.
